scanManager._pageTitle.comment: Title of the Scan Manager Page displayed in on Tab
scanManager._startScanButton.comment: Scan Manager start scan button for user action to use camera

scanImage._pageTitle.comment: Title of the Scan Image Page displayed in on Tab
scanImage._videoStremNotWorking.comment: Error message shown when video is not working
scanImage._takeMoreButton.comment: Scan Manager take more photo button for user action to swtich back to video stream
scanImage._takePhotoButton.comment: Scan Manager take photo button for user action to capture a single frame from video stream
scanImage._turnOnFlashButton.comment: Scan Manager Flash button for user action to turn on camera flash
scanImage._cancelButton.comment: Scan Manager cancel button for user action to cancel video stream and return to Scan Manager Page
scanImage._doneUploadButton.comment: Scan Manager done upload button for user action to finish taking photo return to Scan Manager Page
